participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and family-oriented, loves to share his passion for music with others.
participant_1.background: my wife and kids are the best. i am a plumber. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife. i have three children. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and compassionate, enjoys helping others and expressing herself through music.
participant_2.background: i volunteer at the homeless shelter. my father played violin professionally. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i am a piano teacher on the side. i play several instruments.

content.text: i am a teacher, a piano teacher
